code: import{useState}from"react";import{Box,Button,Text,useToast}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{executeCode}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Output=_ref=>{let{editorRef,language}=_ref;const toast=useToast();const[output,setOutput]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[isError,setIsError]=useState(false);const runCode=async()=>{const sourceCode=editorRef.current.getValue();if(!sourceCode)return;try{setIsLoading(true);const{run:result}=await executeCode(language,sourceCode);setOutput(result.output.split("\n"));result.stderr?setIsError(true):setIsError(false);}catch(error){console.log(error);toast({title:"An error occurred.",description:error.message||"Unable to run code",status:"error",duration:6000});}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{w:"50%",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{mb:2,fontSize:"lg",fontStyle:"bold",children:"\uD835\uDDE2\uD835\uDE02\uD835\uDE01\uD835\uDDFD\uD835\uDE02\uD835\uDE01"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline",colorScheme:"green",mb:4,isLoading:isLoading,onClick:runCode,children:"Run Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{height:"75vh",p:2,color:isError?"red.400":"white",border:"2px solid",borderRadius:4,borderColor:isError?"red.500":"#333",children:output?output.map((line,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:line},i)):'Click "Run Code" to see the output here'})]});};export default Output;
